thread.section_title: ShoeDazzle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ShoeDazzle | www.shoedazzle.com
thread.title: Dianne

author: Dianne
title: Dianne
text: I love this site! I can't stop checking what's new. I've purchased an entire new wardrobe these past few months due to a radical weight loss since last season. Shoes, bags, dresses, sweaters and more. The sales are just awesome too. The one complaint I have is that returns take forever to get your credit. I've been waiting on one credit for over a month. Other than that, the quality is acceptable - not top of the line, but not Walmart either! I like the up to the minute style choices!
